body:
What  happened to avicus?  Is it just me who when i connect, cant go to any games?



just wondering...

title: What happened to avicus?

replies.body: Some things have broke, Funky knows and is working on it currently.
replies.body_tagged: Some things have broke, Funky knows and is working on it currently.

reply_to.body: Some things have broke, Funky knows and is working on it currently.
reply_to.body_tagged: Some things have broke, Funky knows and is working on it currently.

replies.body: don't want to make a post about it and this post is about Avicus being broken so it works,  when i try to create a team I get 500 error 'field "Id" doesn't have a default value' what does it mean? (yeah I know your not a dev but on the error it does say "We've encountered an issue... Please report the following information to an admin.")
replies.body_tagged: don't want to make a post about it and this post is about Avicus being broken so it works,  when i try to create a team I get 500 error 'field "Id" doesn't have a default value' what does it mean? (yeah I know your not a dev but on the error it does say "We've encountered an issue... Please report the following information to an admin.")

replies.body: When the server crashed, it caused the teams to break. Rest assured, they will be restored ASAP.
replies.body_tagged: When the server crashed, it caused the teams to break. Rest assured, they will be restored ASAP.

replies.body: Nah, this problem was probably caused because Keenan tried to fix something or do maintenance, because at this time you had a good connection to the server but the server plugins were buggy. There was no Destroy1, Lobby1 etc. Just a normal lobby and some items and lots of weird bugs.
replies.body_tagged: Nah, this problem was probably caused because Keenan tried to fix something or do maintenance, because at this time you had a good connection to the server but the server plugins were buggy. There was no Destroy1, Lobby1 etc. Just a normal lobby and some items and lots of weird bugs.
